description: This is an illustration course for beginners which will guide you step by step into the powerful illustration tools in flash. During this course we will create a cute monster character .We will learn all the design tools in flash including a correct workflow which will allow you to approach you illustration work with confidence . The huge advantage of illustrating in flash is that it combines all the advantages of illustrator but is also a powerfull animation program ! It is an industry standard for game design and animation ,for creating your own cartoons or illustrations !
title: How to illustrate in Flash
